job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: Job DescriptionA Software Development company is looking for a Site Reliability Engineer to join their team on a full-time Direct Hire basis. You’d be joining a team of unique problem solvers with a multitude of skills and perspectives. You’ll be responsible for taking the lead on relevant projects while surrounded by people who will provide support and mentorship.As a Site Reliability Engineer, you’ll mainly be focused on running better production application and systems, creating a strict engineering discipline and utilizing software and systems to help find creative engineering solutions to operational problems.Required Skills & ExperienceAzure and AWSAzure DevOpsScripting in either Java or PowershellTerraform and ansibleKubernetesDesired Skills & Experience5+ years of experience in an DevOps Environment.OracleSpringbootDockerThe OfferCompetitive Salary: Up to $155K/year, DOEYou Will Receive The Following Benefitshealth, dental, vision401(k)Casual and Flexible Work Culture and EnvironmentAbility to work in a Tech-driven companyApplicants must be currently authorized to work in the United States on a full-time basis now and in the future.Posted By: Connor Bowles
